title: What do teen boys want teen girls to know about them? - Quora
tags: Relationships and Dating of Young People

response.answer_text: Ok, I make this post as a 17 year old male. We know other menIf I don’t trust a dude alone with my girlfriend, I have good reason, I sometimes can’t explain it, but I do. (I trust my girlfriend, not the dude.)We are mostly assholesThe ones of us that aren’t are rare and a good find. If you find one keep them (not as a boyfriend per say, but keep them around as a friend)We are scared of you, honestlyYou guys literally have the power to ruin our lives as teenagers (LITERALLY), I for one am so terrified of that. I’ve had rumors spread about me that I’m working on. One accusation (true or false) and we’re sex offenders and our lives are ruined.We can’t read you guys, please tell us what you wantTrying to read you guys is like trying to understand hieroglyphics before the discovery of the Rosetta Stone, if you like us, tell us.NOT. ALL. OF. US. WANT. THE. SAME. THING.Some of us are complete whores, yes, but there are a good amount of us who aren’t. We don’t all chase women for their bodies (Personally, i find intelligence more attractive than a hot body).We are really really really really incredibly stupendously astoundingly stupidWe make dumb decisions all the time, don’t be surprised if we do something dumb like dm Dr. Phil asking for the N-Word pass (true story)This goes in with us not being able to read you guys. You could have a sign pointing to what you want and we likely wouldn’t know what you wanted.If we like you odds are we are too scared to tell you.Rejection hurts, if you’re gonna reject us, then do it softly. We’ll carry that for a long time.We masturbate, I’m sorry but it’s true. We’re very hormonal teenagers and it feels good. It’s human nature.If we did something wrong, tell us for God’s sake. You have no idea how hard it is to not know what we did wrong because you guys won’t tell us.Well guys, that’s my list of what I want teenage girls to know about teenage boys. thanks for reading! Sayonara, Connor :)

Aight, I’ve seen a lotta these on here and I think its time I answer one. Obviously, this doesn't apply to everyone, but for me it does. let's jump into it, shall we? I know when I ask what you're doing or how you are, and you reply nothing or I'm fine, 90% of the time something is happening, I know this, please tell me, it makes me feel kinda betrayed, and untrustedI can pick up on some signals, like if your hanging around me, laughing at everything, and just, overly friendly, but some people are also that way naturally, please don't be afraid to ask us out, it honestly makes us gain 10x the amount of respect for you.This is blunt, but in lue to my last one don't date 10 guys in 5 weeks, ask me out, and expect a yes. you burn through men faster than I do books, don't be a fuckgirl, plain and simpleIF we call you crazy or something similar and were laughing and still hang around you, it's not an insult, it's like calling us idiots, they can be, but most of the time are not insultsPLEASE let us cuddle with u, it makes us feel 10x better and our day is immediately great, side note, don't get too cozy around other guys, ik you're just friends, ik nothing is going to happen, but I'm an idiot, and I feel territorial, just, pleaseif every time I'm with my friends and leave them to hang out with you, 99% chance I'm at least moderately interested and probs want to ask you out.If we are alone and just talking and cuddling and a group of our friends walks by, please let them walk by, every time you do this I lose my train of thought and want to kiss youIf I ask you out on a date and you say your busy then hear you hung out with, let's say “Jacob”, I don't care if he's a close friend, immediate suspicion, and it hurtshmm let's make it to 10, If you greet us with nothing but a kiss… instant love :))), honestly nothing better (save that for after about a month)If you compliment me on something I control, wardrobe, cologne, hairstyle, etc it makes me feel like I'm on a cloud (make sure it's true though, otherwise your stuck with it, and if we find out you were lying, it hurts a lot)There you go! my top 10!
